content: Bithin Alangot is working at ST Engineering Electronics-SUTD Cybersecurity Laboratory, Singapore with Prof. Pawel Szalachowski. His research mainly focuses on network level attacks on Blockchain infrastructure. He is also interested in using Blockchain technology to enhance security of software distribution systems and authentication frameworks.

title: Bithin Alangot
